description: A spacious and comfortable living area designed for relaxation and entertainment.
A private outdoor or indoor swimming pool for recreation and exercise.
A fully equipped kitchen with modern appliances and ample counter space.
A secure garage with space for vehicles and storage.
A landscaped garden area ideal for outdoor activities and relaxation.
A private or shared fitness center with modern exercise equipment.
A private rooftop terrace with stunning views, ideal for outdoor gatherings.
A quiet and private space for work or study with ample natural light.
Reliable and fast internet connection suitable for streaming, gaming, and work.
